description: Try our easy to follow Black Forest Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Forest Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease and line bases of 2 x 23cm deep cake tins.
Cream butter and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until pale and fluffy. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each. Add vanilla and beat well.
Sift flour, cocoa and sugar together. Fold in using a large metal spoon, alternating with combined milks. Stir until just combined and smooth.
Divide mix between tins and smooth tops. Bake for 40 to 50 mins or until cooked when tested with a skewer. Cool in tins for 15 minutes before turning out onto a wire rack and cooling completely.

To serve, cut both cakes into 3 even layers to make 6 layers. Place a layer on a cake stand. Brush top with kirsch and spread with some of the cream. Scatter over cherries. Repeat layers and finish with cherries. Decorate top of cake with chocolate shavings. Refrigerate until required.

To make shavings, spread chocolate onto a clean, dry surface, such as marble, stone or glass. Leave until just set but not completely hard. Holding a large knife at a 45 degree angle, scrape chocolate into curls. Note: Vanilla extract is different to vanilla essence.
